title: Beautiful 2 bedroom & full bath, eat in kitchen, living room.
description: Beautiful acres with approximately seven and a half acres of pastured land that has run in stalls, water to each of the 4 pastures, a farm pond and access road around the farm portion. Owner has been there 30 years and has never sprayed pesticides. The farm also has a 3 Horse stable setup, tack shop, and chicken coop. The rest of the property is wooded with Green Creek on the southern portion of the property line and federally preserved land on the rear of the property. The Main home has 2 bedrooms upstairs along with a full bath, eat in kitchen, living room, 3 season sun porch, storage area in the front, laundry room, half bath and a front room being utilized as a bedroom. Attached to the home with a separate electric meter is a two story accessory living quarters that is in need of updating and repairs. The attached separate living quarters offers a kitchen, half bath and living room on the first floor with a full bath, bedroom and balcony on the second floor. Additional structures on the property are a workshop/garage and a art studio or additional storage garage. Between the two living spaces is a lovingly cared for flower garden and parking. The front portion of the property is zoned business and the rear is zoned rural conservation.Could be an amazing opportunity for the equestrian, farmer, vineyard, or hobbyist or possible subdivision of the land. Any and all changes of use should be confirmed by buyer. The property is being conveyed strictly in as is condition and all inspections are on the buyer. Information presented is deemed accurate but should be confirmed by buyer.Taxes are based off Farm Qualified it has been removed in 2022. Please text me your phone number for quick response.

title: Riverpark Condominiums combines the luxury of loft-style living
description: Riverpark Condominiums combines the luxury of loft-style living in Fitler Square with the privacy of a boutique 8-unit building.  Enter through the double doors of this bi-level unit into the large foyer, and you are greeted with high ceilings and an open floorplan. To the right is the spacious living room complete with vaulted ceilings, track lighting, and a staircase leading up to the second floor. The four large windows along the living room wall open both from the top and the bottom providing serene views of the Schuylkill River and Riverwalk. To the left is the eat-in kitchen, which was recently renovated with sleek white cabinetry, brushed brass finishes and features stainless steel appliances. The skylight above the kitchen sink pours in natural light while highlighting the large kitchen island with bar seating. This entertainer’s dream kitchen features an abundance of cabinet and counter space, along with room for a separate dining table. A full bathroom located off of the foyer, as well as three spacious storage closets, completes the first floor. Walk up the wide staircase to the second floor and find two amazing sized bedrooms both featuring ample closet space (three in the primary bedroom alone) with built-in shelving. The shared full hall bath boasts a jacuzzi tub, separate stall shower, and a large vanity providing an abundance of storage space. This level is also home to the stacked washer and dryer, as well as a large hall storage closet. At the top of the staircase, you will find double door access to the private rooftop deck featuring a sweeping view of the Center City skyline. This home is complete with a new HVAC system installed in 2018, a new roof replaced in 2020, and an alarm system. Riverpark Condominiums sits just one block east of the Schuykill River Trail, Schuykill Dog Park, and is just steps away from restaurants such as Ambrosia, Trattoria Carina, and Rosy’s Taco Bar. This home is a ten-minute walk to Rittenhouse Square Park and all of the shopping the surrounding streets have to offer.

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

Description
This is a beautiful newly renovated two bedroom apartment with a large professionally landscaped garden and private laundry room in a classic West Philly Victorian house. This sunny apartment has large windows on three sides providing natural light from southern and western exposures. There is an open kitchen and dining area with access to the backyard, a large bedroom with a bay window and lots of closet space, a fully renovated brand new marble tiled bathroom, living room and second bedroom. The kitchen has a new stainless steel dishwasher and refrigerator, large gas range, quartz countertops and zero radius sink. The apartment has beautiful original refinished hardwood floors throughout. There is a private laundry and basement storage room with lots of extra storage space and a utility sink. The apartment has both hot water radiator heat and HVAC heat and air conditioning. This is a great West Philly location, just off Baltimore Avenue and within a couple blocks of the Gold Standard Cafe, Vietnam Restaurant, the Mariposa Food Co-Op, Loco Pez, and much more. title: this sweet 2 Bed/2 Bath townhouse
description:
Quintessentially Queen Village, this sweet 2 Bed/2 Bath townhouse is located in the heart of the Meredith catchment and yet set back from the street for the utmost in quiet and seclusion. Offering an unexpected abundance of outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large shared patio, and topped with a third-floor wrap-around deck leading to a show-stopper of a roof-top terrace, with built-in planters, an irrigation system, and sweeping views of the Center City skyline and Penns Landing. The handsome stone and steel kitchen looks over the chic living room, with a fireplace, exposed brick, hardwood floors, and a built-in desk and shelves. The second-floor bedroom is flanked by large windows and sliders with a Juliet balcony, a newly tiled three-piece bath, and convenient full-size laundry. The third-floor primary suite is sun-drenched, with a large full bath and ample closet space, and access to the deck and rooftop. A top-notch offering in a bar-none location.

title: Welcome to the Aria Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Aria Condominium, conveniently situated at the crossroads of Rittenhouse Square and the Avenue of the Arts. This Edmund Gilchrist skyscraper was built in 1929 and is considered to be one of the finest examples of Beaux-Arts architecture in Philadelphia. Converted to condominiums in 2008, each residence features high-end finishes including wood flooring of varying shades; a gourmet kitchen with wood cabinetry, tile backsplash, granite countertops, and breakfast bar, GE Profile stainless steel appliances including a gas range; Kohler bathroom fixtures, and in-residence Bosch front-loading washer and dryer. Residents enjoy a 24-hour doorman and concierge; state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio; owner"s lounge and clubroom with a flat-screen TV, DVD, surround sound, pool table, executive board room, and caterer's kitchen; guest suite; business center and library and a bike room in the basement. This is a pet-friendly building with a pet spa and dog run. Multiple, reasonably-priced monthly parking options are available nearby. title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Seasonal Bike Share Program, Beautiful courtyards, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

This fantastic split-level Art Museum 2 bed 2 bath apartment screams WOW! Located in a historic row-home on the 1900 block of Wallace St, this incredible 2 bed 2 bath unit is just one component of a multi-unit dwelling and still maintains some of its classic character from its former mansion status. description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 2015 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 20th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, or Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
